channel.title: Water on It works
channel.description: Recent content in Water on It works

item.title: Final Visualization Details
item.description: 1) Relevant Reproducible Code for Final Visualization(s) knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE) extrafont::loadfonts(device="win") library(ggplot2) library(dplyr) library(tidyverse) library(scales) library(ggthemes) library(viridis) Water <- read_csv("WaterData.csv") VegasWater <- read_csv("LasVegasWater2.csv") Water Use As a Bar Graph (Raw Water Use and Total Population) # I know this is untidy but I wasn't sure how else to format it (Lab 11 and the Great British Tidying was super helpful though!) p <-ggplot(VegasWater, aes(Year, Measure)) vegas_bars <- p + geom_bar(stat = "identity", aes(fill = Type), position = "dodge", width = 0.
